name: Metro 2033 PS1 Demake
description:
Metro 2033 Demake for PlayStation 1

PLEASE RATE THE SOUND

Headphones highly recommended

My take on what Metro 2033 would've looked like if it came out for PlayStation 1. At the current moment its a simple showcase with most of the mechanics present but no enemies.

Controls

WASD - Movement
LMB - Shoot
RMB - Aim
Mouse Wheel - Change Weapon
R - Reload
Q - Melee Attack
